parameters.query:
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS new_table AS SELECT * FROM products;
TRUNCATE new_table;

parameters.content:
## This is a content of the example XML file.
### Please use it if the file was not already created

<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" standalone="yes"?>
<Products>
  <Product Price="69.26" Code="S24_2360">
    <Name>1982 Ducati 900 Monster</Name>
    <Line>Motorcycles</Line>
    <Scale>1:24</Scale>
    <Description>Features two-tone paint with chrome accents, superior die-cast detail , rotating wheels , working kick stand</Description>
  </Product>
  <Product Price="118.94" Code="S10_2016">
    <Name>1996 Moto Guzzi 1100i</Name>
    <Line>Motorcycles</Line>
    <Scale>1:10</Scale>
    <Description>Official Moto Guzzi logos and insignias, saddle bags located on side of motorcycle, detailed engine, working steering, working suspension, two leather seats, luggage rack, dual exhaust pipes, small saddle bag located on handle bars, two-tone paint with chrome accents, superior die-cast detail , rotating wheels , working kick stand, diecast metal with plastic parts and baked enamel finish.</Description>
  </Product>
  <Product Price="148.80" Code="S18_4721">
    <Name>1957 Corvette Convertible</Name>
    <Line>Classic Cars</Line>
    <Scale>1:18</Scale>
    <Description>1957 die cast Corvette Convertible in Roman Red with white sides and whitewall tires. 1:18 scale quality die-cast with detailed engine and underbvody. Now you can own The Classic Corvette.</Description>
  </Product>
  <Product Price="90.52" Code="S700_2047">
    <Name>HMS Bounty</Name>
    <Line>Ships</Line>
    <Scale>1:700</Scale>
    <Description>Measures 30 inches Long x 27 1/2 inches High x 4 3/4 inches Wide. 
Many extras including rigging, long boats, pilot house, anchors, etc. Comes with three masts, all square-rigged.</Description>
  </Product>
  <Product Price="64.64" Code="S32_3522">
    <Name>1996 Peterbilt 379 Stake Bed with Outrigger</Name>
    <Line>Trucks and Buses</Line>
    <Scale>1:32</Scale>
    <Description>This model features, opening doors, detailed engine, working steering, tinted windows, detailed interior, die-struck logos, removable stakes operating outriggers, detachable second trailer, functioning 360-degree self loader, precision molded resin trailer and trim, baked enamel finish on cab</Description>
  </Product>
  <Product Price="86.02" Code="S18_3029">
    <Name>1999 Yamaha Speed Boat</Name>
    <Line>Ships</Line>
    <Scale>1:18</Scale>
    <Description>Exact replica. Wood and Metal. Many extras including rigging, long boats, pilot house, anchors, etc. Comes with three masts, all square-rigged.</Description>
  </Product>
  <Product Price="60.57" Code="S18_2625">
    <Name>1936 Harley Davidson El Knucklehead</Name>
    <Line>Motorcycles</Line>
    <Scale>1:18</Scale>
    <Description>Intricately detailed with chrome accents and trim, official die-struck logos and baked enamel finish.</Description>
  </Product>
  <Product Price="107.57" Code="S18_3233">
    <Name>1985 Toyota Supra</Name>
    <Line>Classic Cars</Line>
    <Scale>1:18</Scale>
    <Description>This model features soft rubber tires, working steering, rubber mud guards, authentic Ford logos, detailed undercarriage, opening doors and hood, removable split rear gate, full size spare mounted in bed, detailed interior with opening glove box</Description>
  </Product>
  <Product Price="83.86" Code="S24_3816">
    <Name>1940 Ford Delivery Sedan</Name>
    <Line>Vintage Cars</Line>
    <Scale>1:24</Scale>
    <Description>Chrome Trim, Chrome Grille, Opening Hood, Opening Doors, Opening Trunk, Detailed Engine, Working Steering System. Color black.</Description>
  </Product>
  <Product Price="112.70" Code="S24_1578">
    <Name>1997 BMW R 1100 S</Name>
    <Line>Motorcycles</Line>
    <Scale>1:24</Scale>
    <Description>Detailed scale replica with working suspension and constructed from over 70 parts</Description>
  </Product>
  <Product Price="57.80" Code="S24_1444">
    <Name>1970 Dodge Coronet</Name>
    <Line>Classic Cars</Line>
    <Scale>1:24</Scale>
    <Description>1:24 scale die-cast about 18" long doors open, hood opens and rubber wheels</Description>
  </Product>
  <Product Price="136.59" Code="S18_3140">
    <Name>1903 Ford Model A</Name>
    <Line>Vintage Cars</Line>
    <Scale>1:18</Scale>
    <Description>Features opening trunk,  working steering system</Description>
  </Product>
  <Product Price="90.87" Code="S24_2766">
    <Name>1949 Jaguar XK 120</Name>
    <Line>Classic Cars</Line>
    <Scale>1:24</Scale>
    <Description>Precision-engineered from original Jaguar specification in perfect scale ratio. Features opening doors, superb detail and craftsmanship, working steering system, opening forward compartment, opening rear trunk with removable spare, 4 wheel independent spring suspension as well as factory baked enamel finish.</Description>
  </Product>
  <Product Price="116.67" Code="S18_1097">
    <Name>1940 Ford Pickup Truck</Name>
    <Line>Trucks and Buses</Line>
    <Scale>1:18</Scale>
    <Description>This model features soft rubber tires, working steering, rubber mud guards, authentic Ford logos, detailed undercarriage, opening doors and hood,  removable split rear gate, full size spare mounted in bed, detailed interior with opening glove box</Description>
  </Product>
  <Product Price="54.60" Code="S72_3212">
    <Name>Pont Yacht</Name>
    <Line>Ships</Line>
    <Scale>1:72</Scale>
    <Description>Measures 38 inches Long x 33 3/4 inches High. Includes a stand.
Many extras including rigging, long boats, pilot house, anchors, etc. Comes with 2 masts, all square-rigged</Description>
  </Product>
  <Product Price="141.28" Code="S18_3685">
    <Name>1948 Porsche Type 356 Roadster</Name>
    <Line>Classic Cars</Line>
    <Scale>1:18</Scale>
    <Description>This model features working front and rear suspension on accurately replicated and actuating shock absorbers as well as opening engine cover, rear stabilizer flap,  and 4 opening doors.</Description>
  </Product>
</Products>
